column2: "Israel yɛ wenyindua prɔmprɔm a oyiyi n’aba: naaso mbrɛ n’aba dodow tse no
column3: mbrɛ ɔama n’afɔrmbukyia adɔɔ so nye no: na mbrɛ n’asaase ne yie tse no
column4: mbrɛ ɔayɛ abosondum fɛɛfɛw nye no."

column2: "Hɔn akoma mu apaa; afei na wobohu dɛ wodzi fɔ: EWURADZE bodwuruw hɔn afɔrmbukyia no

column3: Yennyi ɔhen: na yennsuro EWURADZE; na ɔhen no dze
wɔka ntanhun dzidzi ahyɛmu: dɛm ntsi na atsɛmbu fifir dɛ bɔr wɔ kwa mu akɔfi mu no."

column2: "Bɛt-aven anantwimba ho hu bɛka Samaria atsefo: na ne mamfo
column3: na asɔfo a wodzi ho ehurusi no

column2: "No so wɔdze bɔkɔ Asiria akɛkyɛ ɔhen Jareb: enyito bɛka Efraim
column3: na Israel enyi ato wɔ n’apam ho."
woetwa ne hen akyen dɛ nsuenyi ehur."

column2: "Aven nsorɔnsorɔmbea so a ɔyɛ Israel hɔn bɔn no
column3: wɔbɛsɛɛ no: nsoɛ na nkɔkrɔw befifir hɔn afɔrmbukyia do; na wɔbɛse mbepɔw dɛ
column4: Hom nkata hɛn do; na akoko dɛ

column3: ifitsi Gibea nda do na ayɛ bɔn: hɔ na wogyinae; amma ɔsa a wotuu no wɔ emumuyɛfo mba do no aannto hɔn wɔ Gibea."
mebɛtsea hɔn; na wobehyiahyia aman aba hɔn do
column4: ber a wɔdze hɔn emumuyɛ ho akatua aba hɔn do ebien no."

column2: "Na Efraim yɛ nantwifɔr a wɔakyerɛkyerɛ no a ɔpɛ ewuporow; na emi dze
column3: matra aba no kɔn fɛɛfɛw no do: medze apɔnkɔdofo bɛba Efraim do; Juda bofuntum

column2: "Hom ndua aba mma hom ho wɔ tsenenee mu
column3: hom mbu no mbɔbɔrhu mu; hom ndɔw hom epe: na edu ber a wɔdze hwehwɛ EWURADZE ekyir kwan
column4: ekesi dɛ ɔbɛba abɔtɔ ndzeyɛtsenenee nsu egu hom do."

column3: hom ebu emumuyɛ; hom edzi ator aba: na ɔwo
column4: edze woho tweer wo kwan no do
column5: na wo mbarimba akatakyi no hɔn dodow."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi weɔɔweɔɔyɛ bɔsoɛr wɔ wo man no mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Salman sɛɛ Bɛt-arbel wɔ ɔko ber no mu: wɔtsetseew na nye ne mba mu esinesin."
